Localization.Name: Apocalypse Arms
Localization.Description: Apocalypse Arms produces aggressive, devastating weapons inspired by Messer-Era technology.

English.Name: Apocalypse Arms
English.Description: Apocalypse Arms produces aggressive, devastating weapons inspired by Messer-Era technology.

Localization.Name: Hellion Scattergun Sharkmouth Edition
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: Apocalypse Arms
Item Type: Ballistic Scattergun
Size: 2

Apocalypse Arms' Hellion is a size two scattergun that saturates targets with ballistic ammo in close quarters. The gun's smart ammo functionality allows it to switch between standard and specialty rounds.
